00033 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00034 
00035 //defines hgversion
00036 #include "hgversion.h"
00037 static const std::string version_str = std::string(VERSION) + " " + hgversion + " (compiled " __DATE__ ", " __TIME__ ")";
00038 
00039 const std::string &CtpVersionStr()
00040 {
00041     return version_str;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void HelpTextHeader(const std::string &tool_name)
00045 {
00046     std::cout
00047          << "==================================================\n"
00048          << "========   VOTCA (http://www.votca.org)   ========\n"
00049          << "==================================================\n\n"
00050          << "please submit bugs to " PACKAGE_BUGREPORT "\n\n" 
00051          << tool_name << ", version " << votca::ctp::CtpVersionStr() 
00052          << "\nvotca_csg, version " << votca::csg::CsgVersionStr()
00053          << "\nvotca_tools, version " << votca::tools::ToolsVersionStr()
00054          << "\n\n";
00055 }

00057 }}
